description: Hot Frenchie Christophe Blanc hears about all the fun he missed at the orgy from Richard Black and Wilfried Knight. At a restaurant, Knight recognizes smooth Latino heartthrob Luciano Haas from the photo that Lucas left behind, and invites him over for a hotel-room foursome. They all feast on Blacks rock-hard cock before splitting up into pairs to suck each other off. Then Haas fucks Knight and Blanc fucks Black, both doggy-style, before switching it up for a giant sploogefest of an ending.
title: Christophe Blanc, Richard Black, WIlfried Knight, and Luciano Haas
